title: JamesDaniel90
author: JamesDaniel90
content: Have just started investing in MultiverseX (EGLD) which was formally known as Elrond. Tokenomics are great with a circulating supply of 25 million and total supply of only 31 million its not far off Bitcoin in terms of how scarce it is. It is not a project I hear too much about and only stumbled upon it a few days ago. Just wondering if there is much interest on this forum and for those who know a thing or two about it what can we expect next bull run? $1000 seems to be the average prediction which would give us a 24x return.

comments.author: DapanasFruit
comments.body: There is a good future awaiting for the Multiverse and I understand that Elrond can be a top contender in this coming big and exciting industry...though I think you really have to hold and wait as the potential of the Multiverse is just slowly getting there. No need to rush anyway, Take your "investment" in Elrond as a long-term one and in the right time am sure you can say you made the right call. So good luck and more power.

comments.author: disconnectme
comments.body: Quote from: DapanasFruit on March 25, 2023, 01:50:34 PMThere is a good future awaiting for the Multiverse and I understand that Elrond can be a top contender in this coming big and exciting industry...though I think you really have to hold and wait as the potential of the Multiverse is just slowly getting there. No need to rush anyway, Take your "investment" in Elrond as a long-term one and in the right time am sure you can say you made the right call. So good luck and more power. I don't share your enthusiasm about the project, the project might pump in the future but to me, it has turned into another pump-and-dump token, the team rebranded after the hack and created another token also added more to the team's quota. The project is not gaining adoption, almost no one is using the platform, and the most successful Game moved to Avax. I think the project needs to deliver first before talking about price action. Yesterday's price is not today's price

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on March 25, 2023, 01:07:07 AMHave just started investing in MultiverseX (EGLD) which was formally known as Elrond. Tokenomics are great with a circulating supply of 25 million and total supply of only 31 million its not far off Bitcoin in terms of how scarce it is. It is not a project I hear too much about and only stumbled upon it a few days ago. Just wondering if there is much interest on this forum and for those who know a thing or two about it what can we expect next bull run? $1000 seems to be the average prediction which would give us a 24x return. What? What $1,000, what are you talking about? At the expense of what will be the growth, and even in 2 times higher than the previous ATH, even the top altcoins do not always grow so dramatically. Now the project has a billion dollars capitalization and circulating supply of almost 100%, to attract the growth of x24, calculate for yourself, how much should attract the project. Given that the hype on metaverses has already died down, you have to dream that this project crawled at least to its ATH, and here already some dreams about 24x. That's not going to happen.

comments.author: fvb
comments.body: Now there are so many different projects created on the hype of the multiverse. Personally, I am skeptical about all this, because I see only one video and different project trailers. And at least some semblance of a finished product is not. Maybe in the future

comments.author: JamesDaniel90
comments.body: Quote from: Xal0lex on March 26, 2023, 01:07:14 PMQuote from: JamesDaniel90 on March 25, 2023, 01:07:07 AMHave just started investing in MultiverseX (EGLD) which was formally known as Elrond. Tokenomics are great with a circulating supply of 25 million and total supply of only 31 million its not far off Bitcoin in terms of how scarce it is. Now the project has a billion dollars capitalization and circulating supply of almost 100%, to attract the growth of x24, calculate for yourself, how much should attract the project. Given that the hype on metaverses has already died down, you have to dream that this project crawled at least to its ATH, and here already some dreams about 24x. That's not going to happen.$1000 is not my prediction just an amount I have seen mentioned a few times, I am aware that is a lot to ask. I am not going to go to heavy with this altcoin - will DCA until I have 25 and hope it does a 10x or something which is not impossible.

comments.author: AmoreJaz
comments.body: Quote from: Xal0lex on March 26, 2023, 01:07:14 PMQuote from: JamesDaniel90 on March 25, 2023, 01:07:07 AMHave just started investing in MultiverseX (EGLD) which was formally known as Elrond. Tokenomics are great with a circulating supply of 25 million and total supply of only 31 million its not far off Bitcoin in terms of how scarce it is. It is not a project I hear too much about and only stumbled upon it a few days ago. Just wondering if there is much interest on this forum and for those who know a thing or two about it what can we expect next bull run? $1000 seems to be the average prediction which would give us a 24x return. What? What $1,000, what are you talking about? At the expense of what will be the growth, and even in 2 times higher than the previous ATH, even the top altcoins do not always grow so dramatically. Now the project has a billion dollars capitalization and circulating supply of almost 100%, to attract the growth of x24, calculate for yourself, how much should attract the project. Given that the hype on metaverses has already died down, you have to dream that this project crawled at least to its ATH, and here already some dreams about 24x. That's not going to happen. i don't know how people are also expecting that a lot from this type of project. the likelihood of going down is more plausible to happen rather than going up to 24x. maybe 1/24 x, that's gonna happen here. most projects are on the downhill side rather than on the uphill side. it is not being pessimistic here but the reality of what will happen to most coins and tokens. even rock solid projects can easily go down depending on the dev team themselves.

comments.author: yazher
comments.body: Quote from: fvb on March 26, 2023, 01:17:46 PMNow there are so many different projects created on the hype of the multiverse. Personally, I am skeptical about all this, because I see only one video and different project trailers. And at least some semblance of a finished product is not. Maybe in the futureIt started last 2 years and it seems like they are really serious about it because most of the other big companies also joins this huge innovation which will be heading towards it in the next few years to come. Most of the time they talk about this a lot and they are not joking about their enthusiasm and wanted to adopt it in their companies.I also see a metaverse where they will create a whole city for the sake of tourism and even if you can't go there, you will have some idea about the place and they will gonna make it more realistic so that the tourist will enjoy their visits next time they visit Dubai for real.

comments.author: fvb
comments.body: It will be a great project if everything they talk about really comes true and all the plans work out. It’s just that many projects appear that, on the wave of this hype, are trying to provide some kind of good projects, but basically this does not lead anywhere, but is shown at such a level as if everything is already ready. But in fact, this is just an ordinary trailer created to be shown on social networks. But the idea is really good and whoever gets it, it will be a great breakthrough.

comments.author: JamesDaniel90
comments.body: Been over a year since I last bought any of this but like everything else it is crashing and just noticed it is now below $17 for first time since 2021. Tempted to by some more if it keeps falling to reduce my average buy price - it has great tokenomics with 31 Billion supply and 28 billion already circulating.Is this still worth a buy at these lows or likely dead?
